channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0038; 12:57AM; 7400 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48KPYsQ; #VanNuys; It took 70 firefighters 25 minutes operating in defensive mode to extinguish heavy fire consuming a one-story commercial building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E239 E273 E275 E287 E289 E290 E39 E73 E81 E87 E89 E90 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA889 SQ87 T39 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH8; 12 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0038; 12:32AM; 7400 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48KPYsQ; #VanNuys; One-story commercial building with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode. ; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E239 E273 E275 E287 E289 E290 E39 E73 E81 E87 E89 E90 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA889 SQ87 T39 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 12 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Technical Rescue; INC#0231; 07:35AM; 1521 S Hill St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uYwLWP; #DowntownLA; Firefighters located a man behind a brick wall inside of a commercial building. The man was awake and talking to them, but trapped and unable to free himself. Firefighters breached the wall with sledgehammers and other tools to free the man. Paramedics evaluated him, found him to be in good condition, and he was released into LAPD custody (LAPD INC#0658). Nothing further. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E203 E210 E227 E3 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA27 RA803 RA827 T10 T27 T3 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Technical Rescue; INC#0231; 06:13AM; 1521 S Hill St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uYwLWP; #Downtown; Firefighters are on scene of a commercial building, where a man is trapped inside of the buildingâ€™s ducting system. Crews are beginning to breach a wall to make access and rescue the man.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E203 E210 E227 E3 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA27 RA803 RA827 T10 T27 T3 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Sinking Boat; INC#1512; 08:40PM; 1001 S Seaside Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SWDzfG; #SanPedro; Firefighters from LAFD Boats used pumps to eject water from the vessel and successfully keep it afloat. Crews towed the vessel to dock, where they can safely address the problem with the vessel. No reported injuries. Nothing further.; FS 111; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E238 E36 E40 T38; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Sinking Vessel; INC#1512; 07:39PM; 1001 S Seaside Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SWDzfG; #SanPedro; LAFD Fire Boats responded to an approximately 30- to 40-foot vessel that is taking on water at or near the Los Angeles Harbor. Crews are setting up pumps to assist with dewatering to help keep the vessel afloat.; FS 111; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E238 E36 E40 T38; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0908; 01:30PM; 1304 E 107th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4c00LlU; #Watts; Firefighters responded to reports of a "back house" filled with smoke. Crews found fire inside of a converted garage to the rear of a single-family residential property. The first 18 firefighters extinguished the flames in 12 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC13 BC4 E21 E221 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0412; 08:51AM; 2706 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48LHWRh; #Westlake; Firefighters found a boarded-up two-story commercial building with smoke showing, and the site of a previous fire. Crews made entry and found a rubbish fire on the second floor (contents only), and extinguished the flames before the structure became involved. The first 18 firefighters handled the fire in 17 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E211 E229 E29 E3 EM11 RA11 RA13 RA811 SO1 T11 T20 T29; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0412; 08:34AM; 2706 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48LHWRh; #Westlake; PRELIM: Two-story boarded-up commercial building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E211 E229 E29 E3 RA11 RA811 T11 T20 T29; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0830; 12:34PM; 5201 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49YfuMh; #VermontSquare; Firefighters responded to a one-story garage with smoke showing. Firefighters discovered two cars on fire inside the garage. Hose lines were quickly deployed and extinguishment took place. There was one exposure which was extinguished quickly from units in the alley. 26 Firefighters took 10 minutes to put the fire out. No injuries reported and fire is under investigation. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E233 E266 E46 E66 RA15 RA33 SQ21 T15 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Krishan Vadukul
